A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Full of everything that makes a movie bad. Plot holes\, plot armor\, idiot plot (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Idiot_plot)\, mary sue\, product placement and the most unforgivable of all\, the embarrassing way they handled Luke Skywalker's character. But what can you expect from the people who brought you The Last Airbender? Perhaps they confused Star Wars for Space Balls.
